title: Google\Cloud\Core\Batch\InterruptTrait
name: InterruptTrait
description: A trait to assist in handling interrupt signals and gracefully stopping work.

methods.name: sigHandler
methods.description:
A signal handler for setting the terminate switch.

http://php.net/manual/en/function.pcntl-signal.php

params.name: siginfo
params.description: An array representing the signal information. Defaults to null.
